original: Hetusampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁hetu sampayutta ṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ

original: Hetusampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁hetu sampayutta ṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Hetuvippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁hetu vippayutt aṃ ▁abyākat aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁nahetu vippayutt o ▁na a byākat o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁ārammaṇe ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
